SECURITY TRAINING SERVICES

Train Your Team. Reduce Human Error. Meet Compliance Requirements.

90% of cyber breaches are caused by human error. Our comprehensive security training programs turn your employees from security risks into security assets, while meeting insurance and compliance requirements.

WHY SECURITY TRAINING MATTERS

REDUCE HUMAN ERROR

90% of cyber breaches are caused by human error. Proper training reduces this risk significantly.

MEET COMPLIANCE

Many regulations and insurance policies require regular security training for employees.

BUILD SECURITY CULTURE

Create a security-first mindset throughout your organization with ongoing training and awareness.

OUR TRAINING PROGRAMS

PHISHING SIMULATIONS

Realistic phishing simulations to test and train your employees on identifying and responding to phishing attempts.

  • Custom Phishing Templates
  • Real-time Click Tracking
  • Immediate Training on Failures
  • Progress Reporting
  • Quarterly Campaigns

COMPLIANCE TRAINING

Industry-specific compliance training for HIPAA, PCI DSS, SOC 2, and other regulatory requirements.

  • HIPAA Training for Healthcare
  • PCI DSS for Payment Processing
  • GDPR for International Business
  • Annual Certification
  • Audit Trail Documentation

SECURITY AWARENESS

Comprehensive security awareness training covering all aspects of cybersecurity best practices.

  • Password Security
  • Social Engineering Awareness
  • Data Protection
  • Incident Reporting
  • Mobile Device Security

CERTIFICATION PROGRAMS

Professional cybersecurity certification programs for IT staff and security professionals.

  • CompTIA Security+
  • Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
  • Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
  • Custom Internal Certifications
  • Continuing Education Credits
